parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.?

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the secondary text color of a text control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetTextColorSecondary''' color

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - Text control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - Color in format RGBA

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlText [[ctrlSetTextColorSecondary]] [1, 0.5, 0.1, 0.5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlTextSecondary]] [[ctrlSetText]] [[ctrlText]] [[ctrlSetTextSecondary]]
</value></part></template>
